issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice advocate, supports comprehensive reproductive healthcare and opposes restrictions on abortion access

issues.title: Poverty Reduction
issues.description: Supports expanding social safety net programs, increasing minimum wage, and addressing systemic economic inequality

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding Medicaid, protecting Affordable Care Act, and increasing access to mental health services

issues.title: Climate Change
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate action, supports Green New Deal framework, and renewable energy investments

issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Supports reducing mass incarceration, ending mandatory minimum sentences, and addressing racial disparities in criminal justice system

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded early childhood education programs

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, pathways to citizenship, and protecting DACA recipients
